parameters.name: HostShareKeyId
parameters.description: The ID of the shared key whose information you want to modify.

parameters.name: HostShareKeyName
parameters.description: The name of the shared key.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the bastion host. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: PassPhrase
parameters.description: The passphrase of the private key. The value is a Base64-encoded string.

parameters.name: PrivateKey
parameters.description: The private key. The value is a Base64-encoded string.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the bastion host. For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
